title: The Invisible Man ////// 301
description:
The Invisible Man ////// 301 Part 1of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Indiana - May 7th, 1993 a woman notifies the Hamilton County Sheriff’s department that her husband is missing. She has not seen him since Thanksgiving, almost six months ago. Paul Raymond Harrod has not been seen since and many are calling Paul the Invisible Man. Beer of the Week - Dark Subject Matter by Monday Night Brewing Garage Grade - 4 and 1/2 bottle caps out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
